pages.text: This lightweight armor provides significant protection from attacks.$(br2)$(info) In addition, wearing Sylvan armor will reduce herb cost of $(l:spells/introduction)spells$().$(br2)Starting with a 2% reduction with one piece, it increases to 8% with a full set.$(br2)$(info) It can be repaired with $(l:resources/fey_leather)fey leather$().
